game.name: Highway Rider Extreme
game.description:
Highway Rider Extreme is a highly addictive new bike racing game designed for boys of all groups. Challenge your driving skills to dominate the highways and reach the final destination first. Get ready to run the fastest motorbikes in the world. In this free online endless arcade traffic racing game, all you need to keep patience to make a huge score in the end. It will be exciting to run your bike with a speed of 180 mph on a crowded road. Avoid all the cars that come on your way to become a real rider!

Start this super fast racing game with putting on a helmet before riding your bike. You will have to complete each level within the stipulated time. The key to winning this brand new racing game for boys and girls is to reach the finish line as fast as possible without crashing your vehicle. Make sure that you collect the maximum possible coins, dodge traffic as well as pass other vehicles as closely as you can to earn the bonus time. Your good performance in this best html5 game will help purchase upgrades and advanced bikes from the shop to run your bike even faster.

The daily bonus levels can be unlocked with a proper attention. Make sure that you accomplish the map with the highest possible score in this fun bike racing game. So, what are you thinking friends? Get into this worlds most popular motorbike game if you are much capable of handling heat and running a bike like a pro. Let r your bike on the highway with various wonderful four seasons. Have an adventurous gaming experience filled with thrilling stunts and real-life action!
